Title: The Distance Between Us
Writer: Andrew Crane (script editor), Jacqueline Escolme (script editor), Chandu Yarram, Maryann Yarram (script editor)
Actors: Rahul Rai, Leah Kavita, Ariane Mallon, Akshay Reddy
Plot: The story revolves around Megha, an ambitious, software professional who develops a software product and dreams of selling it and settling down in career quickly...
